faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Do I need to book in advance?
faq.a1: We recommend booking at least one day in advance to secure your seat.
faq.q2: Is there a discount for children?
faq.a2: Yes, children up to 7 years old get a 50% discount.
faq.q3: How much does a ticket cost?
faq.a3:
Ticket prices to Skopje:
  • From Berovo: 550 MKD one way, 900 MKD return ticket.
  • From Vinica: 450 MKD one way, 700 MKD return ticket.
  • From Sveti Nikole: 300 MKD one way.
faq.q4: How long is the return ticket valid?
faq.a4: The return ticket is valid for 30 days from the departure date.
faq.q5: How can I cancel a reservation?
faq.a5: You can cancel by calling us at least 12 hours before departure.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Your privacy is our highest priority. This Privacy Policy informs you which information is collected, how it is used, and how it is protected when using our website.
privacy.dataCollectionContent: Each traveler is required to provide their basic information when using our services, including first and last name, email, and phone number. This information is collected for the purpose of confirming and organizing reservations or services, contacting the traveler regarding their requests or inquiries, and sending important information related to the service.
privacy.protectionContent: All personal data is stored securely and is not shared with third parties, except where required by law or for providing our services. We use technical and organizational measures to protect data from unauthorized access, alteration, or destruction.
